about_the_game:
The EX Graphic Village Expansion is a Tileset for the RPG Maker MV and MZ to help get your hero’s journey to continue, with detailed pixel art tiles that let you grow up your villages.
You can easily combine it with the EX Graphic Baseset Outdoor or use it alone to make more and bigger Cities.
This set includes many options from Handmade Ground Tiles to small ships for a Harbor. There are Many unique Buildings from a Church , Farmhouse , Blacksmith , Shop and residential buildings.

The Set include
9 Tilesheets
● A1-A5 tiles：4 sheets
● B-E tiles：5 sheets

----

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
